Detailed Description

Contains default values for Atom feeds.

Member Data Documentation

const int Atom.Utils.DefaultValues.Int = -1

The default value for int values.

const Relationship Atom.Utils.DefaultValues.Rel = Relationship.Alternate

The default relationship for the links.

  • alternate The URI in the href attribute points to an alternate representation of the containing resource.
  • start The Atom feed at the URI supplied in the href attribute contains the first feed in a linear sequence of entries.
  • next The Atom feed at the URI supplied in the href attribute contains the next N entries in a linear sequence of entries.
  • prev The Atom feed at the URI supplied in the href attribute contains the previous N entries in a linear sequence of entries.
  • service.edit The URI given in the href attribute is used to edit a representation of the referred resource.
  • service.post The URI in the href attribute is used to create new resources.
  • service.feed The URI given in the href attribute is a starting point for navigating content and services.

It defaults to "alternate".

MediaType Atom.Utils.DefaultValues.MediaType [static, get]

The default media type. It defaults to "text/plain".

Mode Atom.Utils.DefaultValues.Mode [static, get]

The default encoding mode for the contents.

  • xml The content is inline xml.
  • escaped The content is an escaped string.
  • base64 The content is base64 encoded.

Processors must decode the element's content before considering it as content of the the indicated media type. It defaults to "xml".

Uri Atom.Utils.DefaultValues.Uri [static, get]

The default uri for Uri fields.

The default UTC offset.
